Nakshatra '12 Date Fix Survey

We have fix the exact dates for Nak'12 by 12/11/11. The fest will be conducted in the month of February. We need you to contact any friends, relatives acquaintances pursuing MCA or MSc. in colleges around India and find out which week of February they will be free(*) in and please update this page accordingly.

Kerala

Institute Location Week Your Name Comments (If any)
1234
MES, Kuttippuram Kuttippuram ** Addy Singh MES told me they had exams from 9th-16th Feb. Therefore, 3rd and 4th week they will be free, but not 1st week (which they will be using for their preparation)
Amrita Vishwa Vidyapeetham Amrithapuri **** They don't have any important test-papers & other engagements. But they are not sure about the internal exams. Any ways they're free in first two weeks. Usually their internal exams comes on February last or in March.
